title: Bug 116564 - The title of hyperlink builder should be 'Hyperlink Options', now it changes with settings.
description: The title of the hyperlink builder is not consistent with the expected behavior.
OB: When setting a label hyperlink, the title of the hyperlink builder dynamically changes with settings instead of remaining constant as 'Hyperlink Options.'
EB: The title of the hyperlink builder should consistently be 'Hyperlink Options' regardless of the settings chosen. This provides a standardized and expected behavior for users.
SR:
Steps to reproduce:
1. Set a label hyperlink as 'www.actuate.com'.
2. Observe the dynamic change in the title of the hyperlink builder based on the chosen settings.
